changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Add failed events job for Openelis lab result processing
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO scheduler_task_config(name, schedulable_class, start_time, start_time_pattern, repeat_interval, start_on_startup, started, created_by, date_created, uuid) VALUES ('OpenElis Lab Result Atom Feed Failed Event Task', 'org.bahmni.module.elisatomfeedclient.api.task.OpenElisLabResultFeedFailedEventsTask', now(), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss', 15, 1, 1, 1, curdate(), uuid());

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Add failed events job for Openelis patient processing
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO scheduler_task_config(name, schedulable_class, start_time, start_time_pattern, repeat_interval, start_on_startup, started, created_by, date_created, uuid) VALUES ('OpenElis Patient Atom Feed Failed Event Task', 'org.bahmni.module.elisatomfeedclient.api.task.OpenElisPatientFeedFailedEventsTask', now(), 'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss', 15, 0, 0, 1, curdate(), uuid());

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Don't start the patient feed on startup
changeSet.sql: UPDATE scheduler_task_config SET start_on_startup = 0 WHERE name = 'OpenElis Patient Atom Feed Task';

changeSet.author: tw
tw

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from liquibasechangelog where author='elisatomfeedclient' and id='100';

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `liquibasechangelog` (`ID`,`AUTHOR`,`FILENAME`,`DATEEXECUTED`,`MD5SUM`,`DESCRIPTION`,`COMMENTS`,`TAG`,`LIQUIBASE`,`EXECTYPE`,`ORDEREXECUTED`) VALUES ('100','ict4h','sql/db_migrations.xml',now(),'3:8ee36a0313cda559247cbb2729fe6e76','Create Table (x2)','',NULL,'2.0.5','EXECUTED','100') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE EXECTYPE = 'EXECUTED';

changeSet.author: tw

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from liquibasechangelog where author='tw' and id='elis-atomfeed-9';

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO `liquibasechangelog` (`ID`,`AUTHOR`,`FILENAME`,`DATEEXECUTED`,`MD5SUM`,`DESCRIPTION`,`COMMENTS`,`TAG`,`LIQUIBASE`,`EXECTYPE`,`ORDEREXECUTED`) VALUES ('101','ict4h','sql/db_migrations.xml',now(),'3:29f59eb61eb39a9dee52d81f4026d642','Add Column','',NULL,'2.0.5','EXECUTED','101') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE EXECTYPE = 'EXECUTED';

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.sql: update scheduler_task_config set start_on_startup='1' where name in ('OpenElis Patient Atom Feed Task','OpenElis Patient Atom Feed Failed Event Task');

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Remove scheduled job to process failed Openelis lab results

changeSet.author: tw
changeSet.comment: Remove scheduled job to process Openelis lab results, as this is now part of accession worker

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from visit_type where name = 'LAB VISIT'

changeSet.comment: Creating new visit type LAB VISIT
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO visit_type (name, description, creator, uuid, date_created) VALUES ('LAB VISIT', 'Visits for lab visit by patient when the tests are not ordered through OpenMRS', 1, uuid(), curdate());
